messages.subject: Re: Pushing Harleys and Margaritas

DJ of Texas

messages.subject: Pushing Harleys and Margaritas
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Karen, In the illustrious words of Bartles and James, thanks for yer support DJ of Texas Karen s post: I will NOT chew your butt for pushing kids, but I
messages.messageBody:
Dear Karen,
In the illustrious words of Bartles and James,
thanks for yer support

DJ of Texas

Karen's post:
I will NOT "chew your butt" for pushing kids, but I will stick mine out
also <grin>. I have twin boys who are 8 and they need some directions
sometimes. I love the idea of child-led learning, but not to the extent
that
it is directionless. Everyone can benefit from a gentle hand (or
not-so-gentle)....
My two cents worth,
Karen :)

(PS...put me down for the Margaritas and Harley ride also!)
vvvvrrm
vvvvvvvvvvVVVRRRM
VVVVVVVVVVVRRRRRRRRRMMMM
Less go!
